## ConnectorOptions interface

Common options for connectors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface ConnectorOptions extends Record<string, any> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Record&lt;string, any&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cssClass?](./common.connectoroptions.cssclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional class to set on the element used to render the connector. |
|  [gap?](./common.connectoroptions.gap.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Defines a number of pixels between the end of the connector and its anchor point. Defaults to zero. |
|  [hoverClass?](./common.connectoroptions.hoverclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional class to set on the element used to render the connector when the mouse is hovering over the connector. |
|  [stub?](./common.connectoroptions.stub.md) | number \| number\[\] | <i>(Optional)</i> Stub defines a number of pixels that the connector travels away from its element before the connector's actual path begins. |
